name: Gamebar Autodeafen
description: Mutes Xbox Game Bar party chat at a chosen percent, then auto-unmutes on pause, death, completion, restart, or exit. Includes pause-menu controls and full Geode settings.

Enabled by Default.description: Enable the mod automatically on each level load.

Deafen Percent.description: Percent at which to mute XboxPartyChatHost.exe.

Undeafen Percent.description: Percent at which to unmute again.
